short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multiply the number in a text input box by a custom factor using the context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple right click widget to multiply a given integer by a set value. 

Click the extension to change the value. 

Intended to be used when increasing or decreasing ad spend.
